actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit funding for the Government of Ukraine for the nationalization of strategic assets.
short_title: Prohibiting Nationalization of American Companies and Investments Act of 2023

summary.text:
Prohibiting Nationalization of American Companies and Investments Act of 2023

This bill prohibits Ukraine from using any U.S. government-provided funds for the nationalization, expropriation, forced liquidation, seizure, or imposition of restrictions on the rights of shareholders over property in Ukraine that is owned directly or indirectly by U.S. investors, including interests in a publicly traded company.

titles.title: Prohibiting Nationalization of American Companies and Investments Act of 2023
Prohibiting Nationalization of American Companies and Investments Act of 2023
A bill to prohibit funding for the Government of Ukraine for the nationalization of strategic assets.
